title: A Bed of Thorns and Roses
description: Set during America's Gilded Age, A Bed of Thorns and Roses offers a new take on the classic theme of Beauty and the Beast, following in the tradition of such well-loved authors as Elizabeth Hoyt, Mary Balogh and Loretta Chase. This bittersweet story takes the reader on a memorable journey where lives and hearts once thought irredeemably scarred are transformed by the healing power of love.
author: Sondra Allan Carr
